The character of a trimmer,
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for Jo. Hindmarsh, bookseller to his Royal Highness, at the Black Bull in Cornhil, London: : 1683.
Verse: "Hang out your cloth, and let the trumpet sound ..." Reproduction of original in the British Library.
